process.title: Initial Inquiry
process.description: Potential client contacts the company expressing interest in their services

process.title: On-site Visit
process.description: Company representative visits the client's site to assess the project

process.title: Estimate
process.description: Company provides a detailed estimate of the project cost to the client

process.title: Contract Signing
process.description: Client agrees to the estimate and signs a contract with the company to begin work
